name: Dawn of crafting style game
description:
Inspired off the mobile game dawn of crafting but made in unity so it can be on multiple platforms.

This was mainly prove that I'm capable of making a dawn of crafting style game. A lot will change but I need your feedback. Thanks for downloading. If enough people request I will add a mac version and linux version.

Click on the item in the middle to reduce its "health" once it reaches 0 you get the item. You can visit diffrent areas which have diffrent items. you can make all the primitve tools and sliced bananas and sliced oranges. 

To chop the tree you will need to craft a axe(stick+vine+knife) and add it to your equipment (top right)
